# requiredAuthorizations

**Type Property**

An array of authorization types the room-tracking provider requires.

## Declaration

```swift
static var requiredAuthorizations: [ARKitSession.AuthorizationType] { get }
```

## Type properties

- **isSupported**: A Boolean values that indicates whether a device supports the room-tracking provider.

items.description: A Boolean values that indicates whether a device supports the room-tracking provider.
